Ocean Sky Logistics is looking for Air Export Document Processing Agent to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Documentation Preparation:Prepare and review air export documents, including commercial invoices, packing lists, certificates of origin, and other required paperwork      Ensure all documentation meets the specific requirements of the destination country and complies with international trade regulations      Regulatory Compliance:Stay updated on international trade regulations, customs procedures, and export control laws      Ensure all shipments adhere to relevant compliance standards and proactively address any issues that may arise      Communication and Coordination:Collaborate with internal departments, including logistics, customer service, and sales, to gather necessary information for documentation      Liaise with airlines, customs brokers, and other service providers to coordinate the export process and resolve any issues      Customer Service:Communicate with clients to provide updates on shipment status, address inquiries, and ensure customer satisfaction      Assist in resolving any issues related to documentation or shipping delays      Record Keeping:Maintain accurate and organized records of all export documentation      Ensure that records are easily accessible for audits and compliance checks      Problem Resolution:Identify and address any discrepancies or issues in documentation promptly      Collaborate with relevant parties to resolve problems and prevent delays in the export process      Continuous Improvement:Participate in regular training and professional development activities to stay informed about industry changes and best practices      Propose and implement process improvements to enhance efficiency and accuracy      Reporting:Generate and analyze reports related to export activities, document accuracy, and compliance metrics      Provide regular updates to management on key performance indicators and areas for improvement

Honnasiri Motors is looking for Bodyshop Advisor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As a Bodyshop Advisor, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service and managing the repair and maintenance process for vehicles in need of collision repair and bodywork     You will act as the primary point of contact for customers, insurance companies, and the repair shop, ensuring a seamless and efficient service experience         Responsibilities:         Customer Interaction: Greet customers, assess their vehicle repair needs, and provide detailed explanations of the repair process     Estimates: Create detailed repair estimates, including labor and parts costs, and communicate these to customers and insurance adjusters as needed     Insurance Coordination: Work closely with insurance companies to obtain necessary approvals and ensure timely claims processing     Scheduling: Schedule repair appointments and provide customers with accurate timelines for completion     Parts Management: Order and track the availability of parts needed for repairs and ensure they are ready for the repair process     Quality Control: Inspect repaired vehicles to ensure the quality of work meets industry standards and customer satisfaction     Progress Updates: Keep customers informed about the status of their vehicle's repair and address any questions or concerns promptly     Documentation: Maintain accurate and organized records of repair orders, estimates, invoices, and other relevant documents     Cost Control: Monitor and control repair costs to maximize profitability and minimize waste     Conflict Resolution: Resolve customer concerns or disputes in a professional and customer-focused manner     Safety: Promote and enforce safety protocols and practices in the bodyshop to protect employees and customers     Up-Selling: Identify and recommend additional maintenance or repair services to customers when appropriate

column2: Lovely Autos is looking for Bodyshop Advisors-Bodyshop to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey"     you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service and managing the administrative aspects of the body shop     Your primary goal is to ensure the smooth and efficient operation of the body shop while delivering a high level of satisfaction to customers     Responsibilities:Customer Interaction:Greet and assist customers in a professional and friendly manner     Assess and document customers' vehicle repair needs and concerns     Provide accurate and detailed information about the repair process and estimated timelines     Estimation and Quoting:Collaborate with the body shop team to assess and estimate repair costs     Prepare and present repair quotes to customers, explaining the scope of work and associated costs     Address customer inquiries regarding the repair process and pricing     Scheduling and Coordination:Schedule appointments for vehicle repairs and ensure timely completion     Coordinate with technicians, painters, and other staff to ensure efficient workflow     Communicate with customers regarding any changes in repair timelines     Documentation and Record-Keeping:Maintain accurate and organized records of customer information, vehicle details, and repair orders     Complete and file insurance paperwork and other relevant documentation     Update customers on the status of their repairs and any additional work required     Customer Satisfaction:Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction with the completed repairs     Address any concerns or issues raised by customers in a timely and effective manner     Communication:Liaise with insurance companies and adjusters to facilitate smooth claims processing     Communicate effectively with the internal team and external vendors to ensure a seamless repair process       ?
